page.title: 03Shopping Survey-Spennymoor.
page.content: We interviewed people in Spennymoor on certain questions. One of these was, "Are you satisfied with the shops in Spennymoor or are there any different ones that you would like to see?" When we worked out the results{59%}of the people we interviewed said that they {were}satisfied with the shops in Spennymoor and the other{40% were not. The shops that people would like to see are as follows:{chain stores}were the most popular with 57%; next was {Department stores}with 18% and after that was{fashion shops}with 11%. Then came shops that sold{baby care products with 4% and then{Do It {Yourself}shops with 3%. Some of the other shops also mentioned were toy shops, craft shops, sewing shops and music shops.
